title: Chat streaming responses
description: Integrate streaming API with chat to show real-time response updates. Update chat buffer as chunks arrive for better UX.

title: Repository context with @mentions
description: Implement repository-wide context: index project files, support @filename mentions in chat, reference code across files. Large scope feature.

title: Chat window UI (floating)
description: Implement lua/gemini/chat/window.lua for floating window chat interface. Modal overlay with configurable dimensions, proper buffer setup, and keymaps.

title: Diff preview for smart actions
description: Implement diff preview before applying smart action changes. Show side-by-side or unified diff with accept/reject options.

title: Code generation action
description: Implement lua/gemini/actions/generate.lua for :GeminiGenerate command. Generate code from comments/descriptions with preview and apply mechanism.

title: Encrypt stored credentials
description: API keys in ~/.config/gemini-codeassist/credentials.json are stored in plaintext. Should encrypt similar to how gemini CLI stores tokens in mcp-oauth-tokens-v2.json. Consider using OS keychain (macOS Keychain, libsecret on Linux) or at minimum encrypt the file with a derived key.

title: HTTP client wrapper
description: Implement lua/gemini/api/client.lua as HTTP client wrapper using plenary/curl. Handles request/response, headers, timeouts, error handling. Foundation for all API calls.

title: Buffer context extraction
description: Implement lua/gemini/context/buffer.lua for extracting file content, cursor position, surrounding code, selected text. Fundamental context source for all features.

title: LSP context integration
description: Implement lua/gemini/context/lsp.lua for LSP diagnostics, symbol information, and type information. Rich context from language servers.

title: Health check module
description: Implement lua/gemini/health.lua for :checkhealth support. Verify Neovim version, dependencies (plenary, curl), authentication status, API connectivity.

title: Simplify code action
description: Implement lua/gemini/actions/simplify.lua for :GeminiSimplify command. Refactor/simplify selected code with diff preview.

title: Response caching
description: Implement lua/gemini/suggestion/cache.lua for caching API responses by context hash. Reduce API calls and improve responsiveness for repeated contexts.

title: Error handling and user notifications
description: Implement comprehensive error handling: rate limiting (429) with backoff, auth errors (401/403) with re-auth prompt, network errors with offline indicator, proper vim.notify() usage.

title: Utility modules (logging, async, path)
description: Implement lua/gemini/util/ modules: log.lua for structured logging, async.lua for async/await helpers, path.lua for file path utilities. Foundation for all modules.

title: Code review action
description: Implement code review feature: review git diffs, suggest improvements, identify bugs, check for best practices. Integration with git/fugitive.

title: Fix Gemini CLI auth integration
description: The auth module looks for ~/.gemini/oauth_creds.json which doesn't exist. The gemini CLI stores tokens in encrypted mcp-oauth-tokens-v2.json format and supports api-key auth via settings.json. Need to either: 1) Support reading API key from gemini CLI config, 2) Implement proper OAuth token decryption, or 3) Remove/simplify gemini CLI auth support.

title: UI highlights and virtual text
description: Implement lua/gemini/ui/highlights.lua for highlight groups and lua/gemini/ui/virtual_text.lua for extmark management. Foundation for ghost text and visual feedback.

title: Vertex AI authentication (Enterprise)
description: Implement Vertex AI / Google Cloud authentication for enterprise users. Includes: gcloud CLI integration, Application Default Credentials support, project ID configuration, automatic token refresh via gcloud, and location/region configuration.

title: OAuth authentication
description: Implement lua/gemini/auth/oauth.lua for browser-based OAuth 2.0 flow. Token storage in oauth_tokens.json with refresh token handling and expiry tracking.

title: Integration tests with mock API
description: Write integration tests: full suggestion cycle, chat conversation flow, smart action application, all using mocked Gemini API responses.

title: Rate limiting and backoff strategy
description: Implement sophisticated rate limiting: track API usage, exponential backoff on 429, local rate limits to prevent quota exhaustion, user notifications.

title: Ghost text rendering (single-line)
description: Implement single-line ghost text rendering in lua/gemini/suggestion/ghost_text.lua using extmarks with virt_text overlay. Core P0 feature for inline completions.

title: blink.cmp source integration
description: Implement lua/gemini/integrations/blink.lua as blink.cmp source. Alternative completion menu integration.

title: Unit tests for suggestion module
description: Write tests for suggestion module: trigger logic, debouncing, ghost text rendering, cache hit/miss, accept/dismiss.

title: Streaming response handler
description: Implement lua/gemini/api/streaming.lua for Server-Sent Events (SSE) parsing. Handle partial responses, chunk accumulation, and callback dispatch. Required for real-time suggestions and chat.

title: Chat history persistence
description: Implement lua/gemini/chat/history.lua for conversation persistence. Save/load conversations with UUID, title, messages, timestamps, and context. Enable multi-session continuity.

title: Floating window utilities
description: Implement lua/gemini/ui/floating.lua for reusable floating window creation with borders, positioning, styling. Used by chat and action previews.

title: Vertex AI authentication
description: Implement lua/gemini/auth/vertex.lua and lua/gemini/api/vertex.lua for Vertex AI/enterprise authentication. Use Application Default Credentials and GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT env var.

title: Unit tests for chat module
description: Write tests for chat module: message handling, conversation structure, context injection, history persistence.

title: Unit tests for auth module
description: Write plenary.nvim tests for auth module: API key loading, OAuth flow (mocked), credential storage/retrieval, auth method selection.

title: Workspace context detection
description: Implement lua/gemini/context/workspace.lua for project root detection (git, package.json, etc.) and workspace-level context. Enhanced context for better suggestions.

title: Auth module doesn't load saved credentials
description: The auth._load_credentials() function never calls credentials.load() to retrieve the saved API key from ~/.config/gemini-codeassist/credentials.json. It only checks: 1) config api_key, 2) GEMINI_API_KEY env var, 3) Gemini CLI OAuth. The credentials module exists and works, but is only used for saving, never for loading. This breaks the 'paste API key when prompted' workflow.

title: Chat window modes (split/tab)
description: Extend chat window to support vsplit, split, and tab modes beyond floating. Give users layout flexibility.

title: Document code action
description: Implement lua/gemini/actions/document.lua for :GeminiDocument command. Add documentation/comments to selected code.

title: Lualine component integration
description: Implement lua/gemini/integrations/lualine.lua component for lualine statusline. Shows Gemini status in lualine.

title: Auth module never initialized in setup
description: CRITICAL: In lua/gemini/init.lua, the auth module setup is never called. This means auth._config is nil, auth._load_credentials() is never called, and auth.is_authenticated() always returns false. The fix is to add require('gemini.auth').setup(M.config) in init.lua.

title: Chat context injection
description: Implement lua/gemini/chat/context.lua for automatic context inclusion: current file, language, selection, LSP diagnostics. Makes chat contextually aware.

title: Multi-file awareness in context
description: Extend context builder to consider related files (imports/includes), analyze cross-file dependencies, provide multi-file context for suggestions.

title: Agent mode (autonomous task execution)
description: Implement autonomous agent mode: multi-step task execution, file editing, command running, iterative problem solving. Advanced AI-driven automation.

title: File exclusion (.aiexclude)
description: Implement .aiexclude file support (gitignore syntax) and config.exclude patterns. Prevent suggestions in secrets, env files, keys, large directories.

title: Configuration management module
description: Implement lua/gemini/config.lua for handling user configuration, defaults, validation, and runtime config access. Required by all other modules.

title: README.md with setup and usage
description: Write comprehensive README.md: features, installation (lazy.nvim, packer, vim-plug), quick start, configuration examples, screenshots/demos, troubleshooting.

title: Vimdoc help file
description: Write comprehensive doc/gemini-codeassist.txt with: installation, configuration, commands, keymaps, API reference, troubleshooting, examples.

title: Encrypted credential storage (OS keychain)
description: Enhance credential storage with OS keychain integration (macOS Keychain, Linux Secret Service, Windows Credential Manager). Encrypt credentials at rest.

title: API key authentication
description: Implement lua/gemini/auth/apikey.lua for API key authentication via GEMINI_API_KEY env var and credentials.json storage. Part of the auth module foundation.

title: Custom model support (self-hosted)
description: Add support for self-hosted or fine-tuned models: custom API endpoints, alternative model providers, OpenAI-compatible APIs.

title: nvim-cmp source integration
description: Implement lua/gemini/integrations/cmp.lua as nvim-cmp source. Allow Gemini suggestions in completion menu alongside LSP.

title: Fix code action
description: Implement lua/gemini/actions/fix.lua for :GeminiFix command. Fix issues in selected code with diff preview before applying.

title: Telemetry and analytics (opt-in)
description: Implement optional telemetry: usage statistics, error reporting, performance metrics. Fully opt-in, privacy-respecting, helps improve plugin.

title: Performance optimization and profiling
description: Profile plugin performance: optimize context building, reduce extmark updates, minimize API calls, benchmark against copilot.lua, identify bottlenecks.

title: CHANGELOG.md setup
description: Create CHANGELOG.md following Keep a Changelog format. Start with [Unreleased] section and version structure ready for releases.

title: Treesitter context integration
description: Implement lua/gemini/context/treesitter.lua for syntax tree navigation, current function/class scope, semantic tokens. Advanced context from treesitter.

title: Multi-line ghost text rendering
description: Extend lua/gemini/suggestion/ghost_text.lua to support multi-line completions using virt_lines. Complete inline completion feature.

title: Chat message handling and rendering
description: Implement chat message structure, role handling (user/model), timestamp tracking, and basic message rendering in chat buffer. Core chat functionality.

title: Statusline integration component
description: Implement lua/gemini/ui/statusline.lua for status display: suggestion count, loading state, errors. Visual feedback in statusline.

title: Credential storage module
description: Implement lua/gemini/auth/credentials.lua for secure credential storage/retrieval in ~/.config/gemini-codeassist/. Supports API keys, OAuth tokens, and Vertex AI config.

title: Gemini API client implementation
description: Implement lua/gemini/api/gemini.lua for Google AI Studio API (generativelanguage.googleapis.com). Handle generateContent and streamGenerateContent endpoints with proper request/response formats.

title: Project setup and infrastructure
description: Initialize project structure with plugin entry points, directory layout, minimal_init.lua for testing, and basic plugin loader. This is the foundation that all other modules depend on.

title: Suggestion accept/dismiss keymaps
description: Implement suggestion keymaps: accept (Tab), accept_word (C-Right), accept_line (C-Down), dismiss (C-]). Complete the suggestion interaction cycle.

title: MCP server integration
description: Implement Model Context Protocol integration: connect to external tools, extend capabilities beyond code editing, protocol client implementation.

title: Markdown rendering in chat
description: Implement lua/gemini/chat/markdown.lua for syntax highlighting code blocks, formatting headers/lists/bold/italic. Better chat readability.

title: Test generation action
description: Implement lua/gemini/actions/test.lua for :GeminiTest command. Generate unit tests for selected code/function. High-value P1 feature.

title: Suggestion cycling (next/prev)
description: Implement multiple suggestion alternatives: generate 3-5 options, cycle through with M-] (next) and M-[ (prev) keymaps, show count indicator.

title: Next edit predictions
description: Implement next edit prediction feature: suggest edits elsewhere in file based on current changes. Requires change tracking and pattern analysis.

title: OAuth authentication (Login with Google)
description: Implement OAuth 2.0 browser-based authentication flow for users who prefer not to use API keys. Includes: local HTTP server for callback, browser-based consent flow, token exchange, secure token storage, and automatic token refresh.

title: Unit tests for API client
description: Write tests for API client: request formatting, response parsing, streaming chunk handling, error scenarios.

title: Request debouncing
description: Implement lua/gemini/suggestion/debounce.lua to debounce API requests (default 150ms) and prevent request spam. Essential for performance and API rate limits.

title: User commands registration
description: Implement lua/gemini/commands.lua to register all user commands: :GeminiAuth, :GeminiToggle, :GeminiChat, :GeminiGenerate, :GeminiStatus, etc. Makes features accessible to users.

title: Suggestion trigger logic
description: Implement lua/gemini/suggestion/trigger.lua for auto-trigger on typing pause, manual trigger, character-based triggers, and blockers (completion menu, prompt buffer, disabled filetypes). Core suggestion lifecycle.

title: Plugin marketplace preparation
description: Prepare for plugin manager registries: setup GitHub releases, semantic versioning, release automation, submission to awesome-neovim.

title: Explain code action
description: Implement :GeminiExplain command to explain selected code. Can reuse actions infrastructure or integrate with chat.

title: Unit tests for context module
description: Write tests for context module: buffer extraction, workspace detection, LSP integration, treesitter parsing.
